price: Акыретке ишенбеген адамдарга Биз жан ооруткан азапты даярдап койгонбуз.
arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَعۡتَدۡنَا لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمٗا

version.title: Kyrgyz translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Kyrgyz language, translated by Shams al-Din Hakimov Abd al-Khaleq, reviewed and developed under the supervision of the Rowad Translation Center.

meta.transliteration: wa-anna alladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati aʿtadnā lahum ʿadhāban alīman
